I just uploaded barbarian. You play as Tandum the son of a barbarian chieftan. One day while you are out hunting some red cloaked figures pay your father a visit and you come home to find him dead. Will you be able to assume the leadership role or will you be thwarted by the shifty council member thorgin who wants your job. 
Suggested categories either rpg or fantasy
Wonderjudge. (aka Tim Hamilton)

Posts.EditableText:
I am stuck on fighting the bear.  My HP is too low and I have the stew, but it wont let me eat it.  Why not?  How else am I suppose to gain HP back?  In the Inventory screen it says "Stew8".  I should only have one stew that I am aware of, I only did the stew quest once.  Is it a glitch or am I suppose to heal a different way?

Also is there a guide or at least something that shows all commands?  Me getting told I can not do something over and over again frustrates me enough to just stop playing.  I liked that there was the extra tab at the top for some special commands, like "wield" and "mount", but nothing else.  Typing "help" only gives me very few of the generic commands.  I need something more in order to enjoy the game and story please.  Thank you.
